sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SLEUT-HOUNDE, the ancient Scots name of the blood-hound. The word is from the Saxon sl ot, “ the impreſſion that a deer leaves of its foot in the mire,” and hound “ a dog” ; ſo they derive their name from following the track. See the article BLOOD-Hound.
